transcript.title: PM 85/1970 - Membership of the Commonwealth Art Advisory Board
transcript.content:
PM No 85/1970

The membership of the Commonwealth Art Advisory Board has been increased with the appointment of Mr. Clifford Last. As a distinguished modern sculptor, it is expected that Mr. Last will make a most valuable contribution to the work of the Board.

The Members of the Commonwealth Advisory Board now are:

Sir William Dargie (Chairman)
Sir Daryl Lindsay
Sir Russell Drysdale
Mr. Robert Campbell
Mr. Douglas Pratt
Mr. Clifford Last

CANBERRA
3 September 1970

Biographical Details
Mr. Clifford Last

Age 52, one of the leading sculptors in Victoria, formerly staff art teacher at Mercer House Associated Teachers' Training College, Melbourne, now full time sculptor. He is represented in most State Galleries and the National Collection and in the National Art Gallery of Malaysia.
